title: Sound On: Gun Safety Progress, Gas Tax Holiday Impact
itunes:title: Sound On: Gun Safety Progress, Gas Tax Holiday Impact
description:
Today's Guests: Isaac Boltansky, Managing Director and Director of Policy Research at BTIG, Patrick De Haan, Head of Petroleum Analysis at Gas Buddy, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
